programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: Dirou Niya
programme.desc: The comedy takes place at a working-class cafe located in the heart of a neighborhood, where the characters are passionate about by football, and it's always the talk of the hour, especially with the presence of Mahmoud and Al Kushi, two ex-footballers fighting over glory.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Child
programme.desc: In the hopes of giving her baby a better life, Akça, a hooker, is forced to give up her child, who is taken to be brought up by the wealthy Sule, but the situation changes after the latter has a baby of her own.

programme.title: My Siblings
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around the life and fate of four siblings after the death of their father, as they are forced to struggle in life and face some obstacles in their way.

programme.title: Secrets of an Angel
programme.desc: After years of abuse at the hands of her husband, Cennet phones Zeynep, a lawyer. After his death, he leaves a letter, which turns out to be a criminal complaint, upon which the lives of Cennet's children and Yilmaz will never be the same after that day.

programme.desc: A romantic drama that highlights love stories which end with failure due to various social circumstances. The five parts are called "The Impossible Love", "September Rain", "After You, My Love", "Thank You for Forgetting", "Beautiful Like the Moon", and "O Neighbor of the Valley".

programme.title: Babour Ellouh
programme.desc: The events revolve around the bitter reality of young Algerians, who resort to fleeing and traveling illegally in search of a better future, which reveals many tragic stories.

programme.title: El Karazoun
programme.desc: A Syrian businessman, Adnan, travels to Beirut and gets exposed to an accident at the port explosion, so he decides to disappear in order to teach his spoiled daughter, Nour, how to be self-reliant and discover the truth around her. However, Karim and Rabee try to seize Nour's wealth.

programme.title: Ahl Al Madina
programme.desc: The series presents a vast panorama of social and economic life and the conflict between those who want to erase the memory of the country so that history begins with them, and those who want to emphasize the continuity of the cultural heritage of the country.

programme.title: Harem Al-Shawish
programme.desc: The series revolves around the love of money and power and how the simple and complicated social issues are resolved. It also discusses the things that disturb the lives of people who bring out evil and good in other people's lives.

programme.title: Baad Edet Sanawat
programme.desc: It discusses the change between the past and the present, as the events are set between the 1980s and the year 2014 through Abu Nawras, who lives in a working-class neighborhood and has many children.

programme.title: Forsa Akhera
programme.desc: The story of a woman whose husband has died. She and her son move to live with his family. Afterwards, her relationship with another man causes many conflicts in the family.

programme.title: Ahl Al Madina
programme.desc: The series presents a vast panorama of social and economic life and the conflict between those who want to erase the memory of the country so that history begins with them, and those who want to emphasize the continuity of the cultural heritage of the country.

programme.title: Bbsata 2
programme.desc: A collection of sketches discussing social and global issues like marriage, power, work, and future in a satirical way.

programme.title: Harret El Qubba 3
programme.desc: In the third season, Fares gets killed at the hands of Sayah, and Abu El Ezz thinks that Ghazi is the perpetrator so that he'd get the estate, upon which the conflict between them begins.

programme.title: Zelzal
programme.desc: Harbi buys a house in installments from Khalil who refuses to register the house in Harbi's name after he completes the payment. When the earthquake of 1992 happens, Harbi dies. Khalil refuses to hand over the land to the heirs and clashes with Harbi's son, Mohamed, who loves Khalil's daughter.

programme.title: Al-Heiba Al-Awda
programme.desc: When Jabal's father is murdered, the blood feud sends his family and the Al-Sa'eid family into a cycle of violence and tribal conflicts, as those who have unfinished business with Jabal's father appear to complicate things for Jabal.

programme.title: Udaariyaan
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab; however, as the daughter Jasmine dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Hayya Al Rouh
programme.desc: The story follows an angelic girl named Haya, who, despite her disability, defies all circumstances and insists on confronting them, especially her uncle Mubarak, who left her in the care of her stepfather, Abdul Rahman.

programme.title: End Share 9
programme.desc: After he became wealthy following an unexpected event that took place years ago, Fares finds himself targeted by Adnan and a person close to him.

programme.title: Nassibi w Esmetek 4
programme.desc: An anthology series of various tales from everyday life, including the story, "The White Eyeglasses", that follows Fakhr, who invents a pair of glasses that, when worn, can tell you how others truly feel about you underneath the lies and niceties.

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Cyfres hwyliog am griw o ffrindiau bach ciwt. A fun series about a crew of cute friends.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth, a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen. Welcome to a new series of Jamborî!

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod sioe Arddangos Llysiau Gorau Pontypandy. Mae'r plant wedi tyfu pwmpen enfawr ond mae Jams a hi yn cael antur a hanner! It's the day of Pontypandy's Best Vegetable Show!

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae 'na swn rhyfedd iawn yn yr harbwr heddiw - swn rhywun yn canu - neu'n ceisio canu, o leia'! There are some funny sounds at the harbour today. Someone's trying to sing!

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Thema'r rhaglen hon yw ailgylchu. A science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends, Sbarc the scientist and Nef the Nature Detective. The theme of this programme is recycling.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Glas cwl iawn yn ymddangos yng Ngwlad y Lliwiau. Dysga am y lliw glas. Cool Blue arrives in Colourland. Learn about the colour blue.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Wrth wylio Pigog ar farcud newydd Crawc, mae'r gwencïod yn cael syniad am sut i dorri mewn i'r Crawcdy. Hedge accidentally gives the Weasels an idea of how to get into Toad Hall.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi, celf a chân i blant 4-7 mlwydd oed lle mae Aeron Pugh fel y cymeriad Bendant yn ymuno â dosbarthiadau plant ledled Cymru. Comedy, art and singing series for children aged 4-7.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Nimbwl yn rhy bryderus i fynd am ei fathodyn Clwb Cymylau cyntaf. Mae Blero a'i ffrindiau'n ceisio ei helpu gyda'i nerfusrwydd. Nimbwl is too nervous to do his first Cloud Club badge.

programme.title: New: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn cyfeiriannu ym Mharc Craig y Nos, ac fe fydd Alys a'i ffrind Mila yn gwersylla. Today, Huw and Elan will be surfing in Caswell Bay.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Dere ar antur geiriau gyda Bîp Bîp, Pi Po, Bop a Bw a'r criw ledled Cymru wrth iddynt ddysgu sut i ddweud ac arwyddo'r gair 'sanau'. The friends learn how to say and sign the word 'sanau'.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Shwshaswyn heddiw? What's happening in the Shwshaswyn world today?

programme.title: Dathlu 'Da Dona
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Lilly Wen yn cael parti ar lan y môr gyda Jim. Join Dona Direidi in a fun-filled party, full of games, dancing and singing. Today, Lilly Wen enjoys a beach party with Jim.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Conyn yn ceisio adeiladu pâr o goesau mecanyddol er mwyn ennill cystadleuaeth yn y Ffair Ddyfeisio i Gorrachod. Conyn tries to build some mechanical legs in order to win a competition.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae defaid du a gwyn Fflur ar goll! Wedi tipyn o ymdrech gan Jen, Jim, Bolgi a Cyw, mae'r gorlan yn llawn anifeiliaid du a gwyn. Fflur's black and white sheep are missing. Can anyone help?

programme.title: Sblij a Sbloj
programme.desc: Mae'r ddau ddireidus yn mynd i'r ganolfan arddio gan lwyddo i golli'r llythyren 'b' oddi ar yr arwydd! Sblij and Sbloj visit the local garden centre and manage to lose the letter 'b'!

programme.title: Ben a Mali a'u byd bach o hud
programme.desc: Mae pethau'n mynd ar goll yn y Byd Bach ac mae'r morgrug ar fai. A fydd Mali a Ben yn gallu achub y dydd? Things are going missing all over the Little Kingdom. The ants are to blame!

programme.title: Ben a Mali a'u Byd Bach Hud
Asra
programme.desc: Bydd plant o Ysgol Bontnewydd, Caernarfon yn ymweld ag ASRA yr wythnos hon. Children from Ysgol Bontnewydd, Caernarfon visit Asra this week.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Pan mae Magi'n cynhaeafu kohlrabi, mae Jay a Mario'n siwr bod aliwn wedi dod i Bentre Braf. Jay and Mario are convinced that aliens have come to Pentre Braf!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn ôl gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back with more funny and silly sketches to make you laugh!

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Mae'r Tîm yn gofalu fod dau Hipi Po yn llwyddo i weld sêr. The Team help two hipster Po to see the stars.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen. Welcome to a new series of Jamborî.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Gem ffon yw Hela Pryfed Estron. Mae Norman, Mandy, Sara a Jams yn mwynhau chwarae, efo cystadleuaeth daer rhyngddyn nhw a Siarlys a Meic Flood. The gang play the Alien Bug Hunt phone game.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae dwr yr harbwr wedi troi'n wyrdd dros nos. Tybed beth yw e a sut y gwnaiff yr Harbwr Feistr cael gwared ohono? The harbour water has turned green overnight. What is causing this?

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends. Today's theme is birds.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae'r Blociau Lliw yn dod at ei gilydd. Faint ohonyn nhw ydych chi'n eu cofio? All the Colourblocks come together. How many do you remember?

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan fydd Crawc yn penderfynu gwersylla ar lan yr afon, mae'r gwencïod yn achub ar y cyfle i gymryd drosodd y Crawcdy. The weasels grab an opportunity to take over Toad Hall. Poor Toad!

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi, celf a chân i blant 4-7 mlwydd oed lle mae Aeron Pugh fel y cymeriad Bendant yn ymuno â dosbarthiadau plant ledled Cymru. Comedy, art and singing series for children aged 4-7.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pan fo'r haul yn diflannu, mae Blero a'i ffrindiau'n gwibio i'r gofod i weld beth sy'n digwydd. When the sun mysteriously disappears Blero and his friends zoom up to space to solve things.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw a chriw o ffrindiau yn adeiladu rafft, ac fe gawn ni gwrdd a Hetti a'i cheffyl, Bunny. Today, Meleri will be meeting Megan and a lot of pigeons!

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Miriam Isaac a Leo Drayton fydd yma i drafod eu cyfres newydd ar Hansh, a chawn gip ar y calendr digwyddiadau. Miriam Isaac and Leo Drayton are here to talk about their new series on Hansh.

programme.title: Cymoedd Roy Noble

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad

programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae'n wanwyn ac mae Dan yn gwyngalchu ei dwll gyda help ei ffrindiau. Ond fel arfer, mae'r gwenciod yn barod am gyfle wneud drygioni! It's spring and Mole is whitewashing his burrow.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Today, Ben Dant will be joining pupils at Ysgol Beca to create excellent treasure.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae'r criw'n defnyddio teclyn llywio newydd Sam i ddod o hyd i hoff le Blero yn Ocido...Santropolis! Ond mae'r batris yn darfod... What happens when the batteries run out on the navigator?

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn ymweld a Chastell Henllys. Gwri, Syfi and Esli walk part of the Wales Coast Path, and Huw meets younger members of Caernarfon girls football team.

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd yn myd Prys a'r Pryfed heddiw? What's happening in the world of Prys a'r Pryfed today?

programme.desc: Mae'r brodyr Bidder yn mynd i Ysgol Gymraeg Bro Teyrnon ar gyfer her cydbwyso. The brothers demonstrate why it isn't always a good idea to pour water on fire.

programme.title: Sgorio

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.desc: Caiff Sion ei ddychryn pan ddychwela i'r Felin - mae gan Iolo rywbeth i gyfaddef. Cyrhaedda Jinx a Dani garreg filltir bwysig yn eu perthynas. Sion is startled upon returning to the Felin.

programme.desc: Mae 'na lanast a hanner yng nghegin Cyw heddiw; mae gliter, glud a phaent ymhobman! There's a big mess in Cyw's kitchen today; there's glitter, glue and paint everywhere!

programme.title: Blociau Rhif

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Ymunwch gyda Tref y ci, Elin a Berian wrth iddynt edrych ar ôl pob math o anifeiliaid gyda help eu ffrindiau ifanc. Gwesty Sigldigwt is open! Come join us!

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn yn trefnu parti sypreis i Mabli! All Huwcyn orffen y paratoi mewn amser? On today's adventure, Huwcyn is planning a special surprise party for Mabli!

programme.title: New: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: 'Ble mae'r mynydd uchaf?' Mae Tad-cu'n adrodd stori am Goronwy Gwych, Planed Craig Fach a Chystadleuaeth Adeiladu Mynydd Rhyng-Galactig! Today, Hari asks where is the highest mountain?

programme.title: Nos Da Cyw
programme.desc: Sh! Mae'r haul yn mynd i'w wely ac mae'n amser i ni gael stori fach cyn cysgu. Shh! The sun is going to bed so let's have a lovely little bedtime story.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae'r Abadas ar y traeth yn rasio cychod papur. Mae angen gwynt ar y cychod ac ar y gair heddiw, 'ceiliog gwynt' hefyd. The Abadas learn how a weather vane needs wind to make it move.

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: Cawn gwrdd ag Efa Haf o Gaernarfon sy'n hen law ar gystadlu mewn pasiantau harddwch ledled y byd. We meet Efa Haf from Caernarfon who, on her big day, is a princess in the local carnival!

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Guto, Lili a Benja yn cyfarfod yr enwog 'Jac Siarp', y pysgodyn mawr na wnaeth hyd yn oed tad Guto lwyddo i'w ddal. Guto and his friends encounter the legendary 'Jac Siarp' fish.

programme.title: Llan-ar-goll-en
programme.desc: Mae Dr Jim wedi creu dyfais newydd sbon, llyfr sy'n gallu siarad pob iaith dan haul. Dr Jim has created a new device - a book which can speak every language on earth.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Helpa Odo Dwdl i ddod o hyd i'w chan arbennig hi. Odo helps Doodle find her bird song.

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae Stiw'n dod ag Eurben, blodyn haul ei ddosbarth, adre' i'w warchod am y penwythnos ond yna mae'n poeni bod Eurben yn drist. Stiw brings home his class' sunflower, Eurben, for the weekend.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Yn y rhaglen hon y cnofilod a'r malwod fydd yn cael y sylw. In this programme we get to know about rodents and snails.

programme.title: Patrôl Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae Gwil yn darganfod map trysor ond mae Maer Campus yn cipio'r map ac yn rhedeg i ffwrdd. Mayor Campus snatches a treasure map and runs off to find the loot for himself.

programme.title: Amser Maith Yn Ôl
programme.desc: Mae Ceti yn edrych ymlaen at wisgo ei sgidie newydd i barti ond cyn mynd mae gan Tadcu stori o Oes Fictoria iddi. Grandad reads Ceti a story from Victorian times before her party.

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Mae Og yn poeni'n arw pan mae'n colli pigyn... Og feels very worried when he loses a spike.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae Alun Asyn yn teimlo'n unig. Hoffai chwarae gyda'i ffrindiau newydd, ond does neb yn deall ei iaith "hi-ho". Is it possible to play together when everyone speaks a different language?

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod dryslyd iawn i'r Cymylaubychain heddiw a Ffwffa Cwmwl sy'n gyfrifol. Everyone is confused today and it's all Ffwffa Cwmwl's fault.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae Pablo'n hoff iawn o ganeuon, ac un cân yn arbennig. Ond yw gwrando ar yr un gân drosodd a throsodd am bylu yn y diwedd? Pablo loves music and one song in particular!

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae Cyw a Llew yn gwerthu pysgod a sglodion o fan fwyd ar y traeth. Cyw and Llew are selling fish and chips from a food van on the beach. But where has the vinegar gone?

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â sawl ci bach ac Enfys a'i moch cwta.Today we meet some cute puppies and Enfys and her guinea pigs.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae gan Twm wisg ditectif newydd ac mae'n benderfynol o ddatrys dirgelion! Today, Twm has a new detective costume and he's ready to solve some mysteries!

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Ela eisiau gwybod 'Pam bod tywod ar lan y môr? ac mae Tad-cu'n ymateb drwy rannu stori am sut mae morgrug ar draws y byd yn mynd i'r traeth. Ela asks: why is there sand by the seaside?

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Bois y Pizza: Chwe' Gwlad
programme.desc: Wythnos bant i dîm rygbi Cymru - felly ma'r bois yn aros yn nes at gatre ac yn crwydro eu hardal leol, Caerdydd. The boys hit Cardiff - Corporation Yard, Twt Lol Brewery, Ty Caws, & more. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Gwlad Beirdd: T H Parry Williams
programme.desc: Tudur Dylan Jones sydd yn agor y rhaglen hon gyda chyflwyniad o'r gerdd Ty'r Ysgol. Tudur Dylan Jones and Mererid Hopwood discuss the life and work of poet T H Parry Williams.

programme.title: Gwlad Beirdd TH Parry Williams - Season 1, Episode 7
Parti Bwyd Beca
programme.desc: Cyfle arall i weld Beca yn cynnal noson o wledda yn 'Cell B', Blaenau Ffestiniog. Pea and ham soup, pulled pork and cake are on the menu as Beca hosts a party in Blaenau Ffestiniog.

programme.title: Parti Bwyd Beca Blaenau Ffestiniog - Season 1, Episode 1

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: New: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Taith Bywyd
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, y cyn AS, Sian James, sydd ar daith bywyd - clywn am ei rol blaenllaw yn Streic y Glowyr. This time, with ex member of parliament, Sian James, whose story featured in 'Pride'.

programme.title: Taith Bywyd Sian James - Season 1, Episode 1
Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae Morus Mwnci wedi trefnu mordaith ac yn aros i'w ffrindiau gyrraedd, ond does dim golwg o'r un ohonyn nhw! Morus Monkey has organized a boat trip - but where on earth are his friends?

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â Caradog y ceiliog a Marged a'i chwningen. Today we meet Caradog the cockerel and Marged and her rabbit.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: 'Pam bod ni'n chwerthin'? Mae Tad-cu yn adrodd stori hurt bost am drigolion y dre mwyaf diflas yn y byd, Aberdiflas, ble doedd neb byth yn chwerthin. Today, Lewis asks 'why do we laugh?'

programme.title: Cath-Od
programme.desc: Mae Macs yn gweld cyfle i wneud arian wrth iddo ddarganfod fod gan Crinc ddawn ryfeddol i fod yn gerflun byw. Macs discovers Crinc has a natural talent for being a living statue!

programme.title: Dennis a Dannedd
programme.desc: Beth fydd y direidus Dennis a Dannedd wrthi'n gwneud heddiw tybed? What are the mischievous Dennis and Gnashers up to today?

programme.title: New: Ser Steilio
programme.desc: Creu slogan a chynllun i grys-T fydd yr her sy'n wynebu ein Steilwyr ifanc yr wythnos yma. Creating a slogan and a design on a T-shirt is the challenge facing our young stylists this week.

programme.title: Bwystfil
programme.desc: Mae dannedd miniog a genau cryf o fantais mawr yn y gwyllt! Wythnos yma, rydyn ni'n cael cip olwg ar ddeg anifail snaplyd. This week, we're taking a look at 10 of the snappiest beasts.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Wedi 70ml o odro ar fferm Troedyraur, mae'r tad a mab Teifi a Rhys Evans wedi penderfynu gwerthu'r fuches laeth. We follow a dad and son as they prepare to sell their herd after 70 years.

programme.title: Darllediad gan Llafur Cymru
programme.desc: Darllediad gwleidyddol gan Llafur Cymru. Political broadcast by Welsh Labour.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Wrth i gyflwr Philip waethygu yn yr ysbyty, mae'r straen yn cynyddu ar Lowri. As the day has come for Ioan and Llyr to visit Efan in prison, Elen becomes increasingly worried about Ioan.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm
programme.desc: A fydd ymdrechion Mark i gymodi Cheryl a Gaynor yn gweithio? Sion begs Cai to drop the charges against Iolo... but after everything that's happened, is Cai ready to do this?

programme.title: New: Dan Do
programme.desc: Y tro hwn: ymweliad â thy hynafol yng Nghonwy sy'n llawn nodweddion annisgwyl. We visit a grand Edwardian home in the capital and an old miners cottage in the heart of Cwmtawe.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Gogglebocs Cymru
programme.desc: Mae Gogglebocs Cymru 'nôl. Ymunwch â Tudur Owen a'i ffrindiau - hen a newydd - i sbio ar deledu'r wythnos o Gymru a thu hwnt. Gogglebocs Cymru is back, with laughter, tears and arguments.

programme.title: Bois y Pizza: Chwe' Gwlad
programme.desc: Wythnos bant i dîm rygbi Cymru - felly ma'r bois yn aros yn nes at gatre ac yn crwydro eu hardal leol, Caerdydd. The boys hit Cardiff - Corporation Yard, Twt Lol Brewery, Ty Caws, & more.

programme.title: Y Byd ar Bedwar
programme.desc: Gyda'r nifer o droseddau â chyllell ar gynydd dros Gymru, Dot sy'n cwrdd ag un dyn ifanc o Ogledd Cymru oedd bron marw ar ôl cael ei drywanu. We discuss the rise of knife crime in Wales.

programme.title: Dim Byd i Wisgo
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd, a Sioned sy'n cael ei steilio heddiw - athrawes ysgol uwchradd sydd hefyd yn fam i fachgen dwy flwydd oed. Cadi Matthews and Owain Williams are back in the styling studio.
